sentences.en: Can we run and skip some of the steps herein!
sentences.cn: 这里面我们可以跑跳过一些些么?

sentences.en: Enclosed herein you will find the bill.
Herein lies the keys to the questions.
sentences.cn: 里面包含着问题的答案.

sentences.en: Herein, the author analyzes the overheating of superheater and forward counter - measures.
sentences.cn: 文中对锅炉启动时过热器超温现象加以分析研究,提出对策.

sentences.en: In this article, we herein report four cases of four different etiologies.
sentences.cn: 在此篇文章, 我们要报告分属四种不同成因的四个病例.

sentences.en: It is the intent herein to indicate the accumulation of empirical data.
sentences.cn: 在这里试图指出与累积试验数据有关的问题.

sentences.en: Most of the experiences herein concern cancer.
sentences.cn: 本文中大多数的经历都和癌症有关。

sentences.en: Neither party is willing to compromise and herein lies the problem.
sentences.cn: 双方都不愿意妥协，问题就在这里。

sentences.en: Parties hereto may revise or supplement through negotiation matters not mentioned herein.
sentences.cn: 本合同如有未尽事宜,双方可协商修订或补充.

sentences.en: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentences.cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentences.en: The data obtained by experiments on ESV is also given herein.
sentences.cn: 同时也给出了这种活门的实验数据.

sentences.en: The point is that people grew unaccustomed to thinking and acting in a responsible and independent way. Herein lies another big problem.
sentences.cn: 关键是人们变得不再习惯以一种负责任和独立的方式去思考和行动。其中就存在另一个大问题。

sentences.en: The symbols and notation used herein are essentially those in current use in North America.
sentences.cn: 这里采用的符号和表示方法实际上是北美洲通用的.

sentences.en: We herein present an uncommon, elderly case of VCD.
sentences.cn: 我们报告一罕见之老年男性声带功能异常之病例.

sentences.en: We report herein a patient who was initially misdiagnosed with psychosis.
sentences.cn: 我们报告了一病例,起初被误诊为精神病.

trans.tran_en: You can use herein to refer back to the situation or fact you have just mentioned, when saying it is something such as a problem or reason for something
